title: Unwanted skin card thing
body: So In my inventory, I have skins for champions I don't have. is there a way to trade/get rid of them? Or am I just stuck with them forever?

replies.body: You can hold on to the skins until you decide to to unlock the champion; though, most promotional content for example already unlocks the champ too.  If you want to remove the content from the account, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Be aware that we wouldn't able to trade them for something else, though!
